receiver.heading: Get your assets moving
receiver.paragraph: Powerfully simple file transfer — designed with and for advertising people. We’re building a fast, precise and secure tool that will change how your campaigns go live.
receiver.sub.paragraph: What’s next? Platform integrations, rich asset preview, file QC, AI creative analytics and more…
